snapshotId.description: Corresponding snapshot id, which is the same as jobExecutionId

matchedProfileId.description: Id of the matcher profile which is applied for the record

matchedId.description: Represents relations with another matched records, necessary for saving the history of applying changes for inventory/holding/etc records

generation.description: Generation from the last record with the same matchedId incremented by 1

sourceRecordId.description: Reference to the corresponding source record

parsedRecordId.description: Reference to the corresponding parsed record

errorRecordId.description: Reference to the corresponding error record
